post: We had the opportunity to catch up with Caroline Gao, the Grand Prize winner of BRI's 2023 MyImpact Challenge civic engagement contest. Listen to Caroline describe her nonprofit, The World in Us, a youth-to-youth cultural education organization, and the ways in which MyImpact Challenge helped her to connect concepts like citizenship skills and civic virtues to her work. These are foundational skills and ways of thinking that I dont think I would have internalized nearly as much as I have now if not for the MyImpact Challenge,  Gao said.  https://lnkd.in/ebyqpN3X. To support the MyImpact Challenge civic engagement contest, visit  https://lnkd.in/es_s-XFs  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #MyImpactChallenge

A MyImpact Challenge award winner provides free research training to high school students. Grace Liu turned her passion for academic research into an opportunity to help underrepresented populations have access to that same content. Liu, a student at Syosset High School in Syosset, N. Y., created Research to Empower (ReTE), a nonprofit organization that makes free research training available to all students – particularly students from underrepresented backgrounds. To read more about Grace Liu's organization, visit  https://lnkd.in/egKPeGFJ.  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #MyImpactChallenge

Welcome to the team, Chanell "Tico" Noise! Both an avid reader and adept problem-solver, Chanell joined BRI in 2024 as a Project Coordinator. With a diverse background spanning projects in live events and government contracts, she is ready to support our content team in their ongoing work to teach civics and history.  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #welcometotheteam

Have you heard? The Bill of Rights Institute has a new way to give and its as easy as Click. Travel. GIVE! BRI has partnered with TravelingToGive, a smart trip-planning tool that gives back to teachers and students. By using our travel booking tool, you can make a direct impact on civic education. Visit the link below and plan your first trip now. Every trip you take gives back to BRI!  https://lnkd.in/eNRSQW2C  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #TravelingToGive

Why do teachers love the support they get from BRI? See for yourself! "Thank you for this enjoyable and informative weekend. It was wonderful to connect with other teachers who have a love of civics and civic education. This was a once in a lifetime experience that I won't forget." To support the work that we do, please visit  https://lnkd.in/ePsJtSJy  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #teachertestimonial

Where can we see George Washingtons fingerprints on our federal government today? What would Washington think of our modern American government? These were just some of the questions Bill of Rights Institute Senior Teaching Fellow Tony Williams tackled during a webinar hosted by the nonprofit Constituting America. To watch, visit  https://lnkd.in/eKfE7BAG  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI
We would like to thank Authentically American for supporting civic education by donating to the Bill of Rights Institute.

At the Bill of Rights Institute, we are proud to highlight our high-quality content  including stories of great courage throughout American history. In this episode of the nationally syndicated Our American Stories radio program, BRIs Sr. Director of Content Kirk Higgins tells the story of Charles Lindbergh, who got his start performing in aerial circusesand even delivering the mail. Learn how he came to the daring decision to fly solo across the Atlantic, and how he stamped his place in American history. To listen to the episode, visit  https://lnkd.in/dd2bqTx7  #BRI  #billofrightsinstitute  #americanhistory

Through our Power of the Printed Word campaign, we are working to make pocket constitutions available to teachers and students nationwide. Printing and finishing companies from across America have rallied to help, and have begun donating their services to this great cause. Watch Bill of Rights Institute Director, Corporate Relations Justin Goldstein, CAE talk with Kelly Mallozzi Principal of Success. In. Print, about the campaign and how companies can help put Americas Founding documents in teachers and students hands.  https://lnkd.in/eNSDjhDs Interested in supporting the Power of the Printed Word? Visit  https://lnkd.in/eE-zWeup  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #poweroftheprintedword

1791 was a momentous year in the history of our countryand its a pretty big deal at the Bill of Rights Institute. That was the year that the Bill of Rights was ratified, putting into law rights all people should enjoy, like freedom of speech, freedom of religion, and due process. By making a gift of $17.91 or more, you join us in supporting a network of 76,000 civics and history teachers who serve approximately 7.6 million students a year. You help us deliver market-leading resources and programs that teach Americas Founding principles and equip educators and young people to live the ideals of a free and just society. Visit  https://lnkd.in/eWfkDJbp to donate.  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #1791
